rishikesh.shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • rishikesh.shapes.Shape
      • rishikesh.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    This class represents a Line modeled for processing.js
    Version:
    9.20.2017
    Author:
    rdevanathan686

      • Line

        public Line(double x,
            double y,
            double x2,
            double y2)
        Creates a new instance of a Circle object with the center point being x and y and the radius set to the parameter radius
        Parameters:
        x - the start x-coordinate of the line
        y - the start y-coordinate of the line
        x2 - the end x-coordinate of the line
        y2 - the end y-coordinate of the line

        Parameters:

        Precondition:
